title: What the team is like when Yasuo makes a pentakill

replies.body:
Don't worry they usually acknowledge what they've done.
,,Lol ez noobs."

Got 3 quadra's as Yasuo but not penta's bc 2 of them were denied by one of my teammates while I got myself killed in the last one because I misclicked.

Me right now and desperately trying to get a penta with Yasuo:
https://media.tenor.co/images/ffa3c59542df1e2ff370d75dec07cefa/raw

> [{quoted}](name=Mad King Hades,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Wa1LOA4q,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-06T15:16:10.997+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/gjIJVFt.gif?noredirect

^ My team in URF when we sieged a tower for 20 seconds... ... and then Meatgrinder Garen appeared behind us at the edge of my screen.

"wha- no- NO- NNOOOOAAAAAAHHhuuugggghhhh... ugh... well... good run everybody... nice knowing you all..."

{{champion:86}} : http://i.imgur.com/siqIdkz.jpg[\img]

- The disgusted guy (Yasuo is so broken omg lmao ff)

- The disappointed silent guy, who never talks during all the game and just sits there, wondering how did he and his team allow that to happen

- The flamer, probably flaming the one guy that didn't dodge the knockup and/or crying because he lost promos again
And then no one appreciates it when you get that penta kill and win them the game, regardless if you're a nice guy or not.
